text: L'Enfant prodigue is a 1907 French silent movie directed by Michel CarréL’enfant prodigueTHE PRODIGAL SON and stars Georges Wague, Henri Gouget, and Christiane Mandelys. ==Actors== *Georges Wague *Henri Gouget *Christiane Mandelys *Gilberte Sergy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1907 movies Category:French silent movies
title: L'Enfant prodigue
